metadata.title: CVE-2024-56620 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: ufs: qcom: Only free platform MSIs when ESI is enabledOtherwise, it will result in a NULL pointer dereference as below:Unable to handle kernel NULL pointer dereference at virtual address0000000000000008Call trace: mutex_lock+0xc/0x54 platform_device_msi_free_irqs_all+0x14/0x20 ufs_qcom_remove+0x34/0x48 [ufs_qcom] platform_remove+0x28/0x44 device_remove+0x4c/0x80 device_release_driver_internal+0xd8/0x178 driver_detach+0x50/0x9c bus_remove_driver+0x6c/0xbc driver_unregister+0x30/0x60 platform_driver_unregister+0x14/0x20 ufs_qcom_pltform_exit+0x18/0xb94 [ufs_qcom] __arm64_sys_delete_module+0x180/0x260 invoke_syscall+0x44/0x100 el0_svc_common.constprop.0+0xc0/0xe0 do_el0_svc+0x1c/0x28 el0_svc+0x34/0xdc el0t_64_sync_handler+0xc0/0xc4 el0t_64_sync+0x190/0x194

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-56620` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.13.0-19-generic - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-5.13.0-19-generic-lpae - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-19-generic - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-19-generic-64k - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-19-lowlatency - 5.13.0-19.19
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-1004-kvm - 5.13.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-5.13.0-1005-aws - 5.13.0-1005.6
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1011-bluefield - 5.15.0-1011.13
Available for NVIDIA BlueField platforms

linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-1005-gcp - 5.13.0-1005.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1002-gke - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1001-gkeop - 5.15.0-1001.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1002-ibm - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1004-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1004.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-22-lowlatency - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-22-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-22.22
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1005-nvidia - 5.15.0-1005.5
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1005-nvidia-64k - 5.15.0-1005.5
No subscription required

No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.13.0-19.19').
